## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [`display()`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/SettingTab/display.md) | <code>abstract</code> | Called when the settings tab should be rendered. |
|  [`hide()`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/SettingTab/hide.md) |  | Hides the contents of the setting tab. Any registered components should be unloaded when the view is hidden. Override this if you need to perform additional cleanup. |
